output:
For each position of the array N print "N[i] = Y", where i is the array position
	and Y is the number stored in that position.
input: The input contains 20 integer numbers, positive or negative.
name: Array change I
description: Write a program that reads an array N [20]. After, change the first element by the last, the second element by the last but one, etc.., Up to change the 10th to the 11th. print the modified array.
